emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group surrounding groom Rossie Jackson and bride Ila Richardson cutting wedding cake in home of Little Bush, Dinwiddie Street, Hill District
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 30, 1945, pg. 19, reads: "Bridal Party - Miss Ila Richardson, daughter of Mrs. Charles Smith, of 2577 Magnet Street, and Rossie Jackson, son of Willie D. Jackson, of 305 Dinwiddie Street, were married at the Metropolitan Baptist Church last Saturday. A reception was later given in honor of the couple at the home of the groom's aunt, Mrs. Lillie Bush, of Dinwiddie Street, Shown in the bridal party, back row, left to right, are Herman Rumph II, James Sanford and Richard Ward. Second row: Henry Black, Helen Richardson, June Holt, Martina Richardson and Leroy Hill. Third row: Carrie Belle Gross, groom, Roscoe Bush, best man, and Hattie Holmes. - Harris Photo."
